# dftm-transmission

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository hosts data and code to reproduce results and figures from **Effects of a plant-virus interaction on the transmission pathway in an insect-pathogen system**.

## Contents

* `avoidance`: directory containing the data and scripts for reproducing avoidance analyses and figures
* `mortality`: directory containing the data and scripts for reproducing speed of kill analyses and figures
* `figures`: output directory containing PDF versions of all figures

## Contact

Please contact a corresponding author for any questions, comments, or concerns regarding the paper in general.
